author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

As noticed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44780 , the path pathALCARECOLumiPixelsMinBias is defined in the step2 (RECO), but the path is not part the the process.schedule.

This PR adds LumiPixelsMinBias to the TIER0EXP and TIER0EXPRUN2 steps, as suggested by @makortel in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44780
See also https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44780#issuecomment-2066138968

#### PR validation:

Not yet validated. Let run wfs 1001 and 1001.2 here witn #44767 to see whether the error reported with that PR is still there.
title: Add LumiPixelsMinBias to Run1/2 Tier0Exp step
